title: Stonehearth Alpha 5 v0.1.0r144
description:
Install & play!

Stonehearth - this is a game about exploration and survival in a fantasy world, which includes genres such as RTS and RPG, and not unimportant, and now a popular genre - Sandbox - Sandbox. Your task in the game is to help a small group of settlers to survive and build a safe corner in this hostile world. You will need to set up production of food and other essential items, the construction of buildings and defensive structures, protection for their settlement, and to find ways to enhance and expand the influence of the settlement, meeting different trials and obstacles at every turn.
Starting from procedurally-generated world and random events, Stonehearth combines sim city planner and the good old battles with the countless number of possible variants. The game can be modified anything, at any possible level of modification, from your city, ending the settlers and the creatures inhabiting the world. Tools for this and instructions will be in the public domain, so that it will be able to do each, and easily share with your friends.

F4 key - the build menu. F9 key - shows the path of movement of settlers. F10 key - debug statistics F12 key - highlights all interactive objects on the map.
